Here is the list of zodiac signs and their scores based on a 1-10 scale, along with a brief description of why they received that score at $line:
1. Aries - 6 - Aries' impulsive nature can sometimes lead to costly decisions.
2. Taurus - 7 - Taureans are known for their practicality and responsibility, making them more likely to make smart financial choices.
3. Gemini - 8 - Geminis' quick thinking and adaptability can help them navigate financial uncertainty.
4. Cancer - 5 - Cancers' emotional investment in relationships can sometimes cloud their judgment when it comes to finances.
5. Leo - 9 - Leos' natural charisma and confidence can make them more likely to take calculated risks with their money.
6. Virgo - 8 - Virgos' analytical nature and attention to detail can help them identify and avoid financial pitfalls.
7. Libra - 7 - Libras' diplomatic nature and desire for balance can sometimes lead to indecision when it comes to financial decisions.
8. Scorpio - 9 - Scorpios' intense focus and determination can drive them to achieve their financial goals.
9. Sagittarius - 6 - Sagittarians' love of adventure and tendency to take risks can sometimes lead to reckless financial decisions.
10. Capricorn - 7 - Capricorns' practicality and ambition can help them make smart financial choices, but they may struggle with impulsivity.
11. Aquarius - 8 - Aquarians' humanitarian nature and desire for independence can drive them to make unconventional financial choices.
12. Pisces - 4 - Pisces' dreamy and emotional nature can sometimes lead to impulsive and unwise financial decisions.
Note that these scores are based on general astrological insights and may not apply to every individual with a particular sign.
